name: Timothy Brits
bio: Software engineer from Pretoria specialising in .NET and Node.js. I build maintainable web apps and enjoy coding, audiobooks, gaming and chess. I'm passionate about mental health, inclusivity and social causes. My heart is with Ukraine.
